text: (avanu sresthano, athava) ratriya vele sastangaveragikondu, nintukondu aradhisutta, paralokada kuritu sada jagrtanagiddu, tanna odeyana anugrahavannu niriksisuttiruvavanu sresthano? Heliri; aritilladavaru mattu aritiruvavaru samanaragaballare? Bud'dhiyullavaru matra upadesavannu svikarisuttare
